az: u saw innocence at its best i wanted u more than i wanted me i remember my last thought at night was of u and my first thought in the morning was of u it has been a long time since ive actually sat and adored u but every once in awhile your beautiful smile guides me through a day i hear u r with another and u r expecting i wish u good luck he is lucky 2 be able 2 wake up 2 u each morning c u in heaven
